attributes.action: All healthy middle eastern refugees to go to the army and back to Syria to fight
attributes.additional_details:
So if we send the immigrants back to fight the people that ruined their lives and when the war is over they can stay in Syria or start a life over here if they are prepared to live an honest working life.

NO CHILDREN OR UNFIT PEOPLE WILL BE SENT AWAY. MOTHERS SHOULD BE ABLE TO STAY WITH THEIR CHILDREN.
attributes.background: At the moment there are two serious issues in the world and Europe is the most effected. They are immigration and the Islamic State. You may already know that the Islamic has caused the immigration crisis by making thousands of innocent people fleeing to Europe.

rejection.details: The decision to join the armed forces is a voluntary one for an individual to take.
